= Get Spots =

== Actions ==

 * Obtains all spots in an area.
 * If the zoom is low, the response will group spots.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/getSpots.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>GET</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Not Required</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * latne = _double_
 * lngne = _double_
 * latsw = _double_
 * lngsw = _double_
 * zoom = 0 ≤ _int_ ≤ 20

Optional parameters:
 * heavy = _int_ {0,1}

== Response ==

That WS returns a XML file with the following tree:
 * *root*
  * *spots*
   * {{{*}}} *spot* | id
    * _spot elements_

The spot elements are the following:
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
<tr><td>*name*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*user*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the user who created the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*latitude*</td><td>_double_</td><td>The latitude of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*longitude*</td><td>_double_</td><td>The longitude of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*radius*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The radius, in meters, of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*color*</td><td>_string_</td><td>An HTML color code for the color of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*creation*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the creation of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*update*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the last update of the spot</td></tr>
</table>

If the heavy mode is on, the _spot elements_ will also contain a tree identical of those replied by the [WS_GetChannels Get Channels Web Service] with the same heavy option enabled.

      <longitude>6.21734931382753</longitude>
      <radius>150</radius>
      <color>#7a00c8</color>
      <creation>1300714653</creation>
      <update>1300714653</update>
    </spot>
    <spot id="1">
      <name>GTL</name>
      <user>Super User</user>
      <latitude>49.1020271699258</latitude>
      <longitude>6.2151284447632</longitude>
      <radius>150</radius>
      <color>#7a00c8</color>

      <update>1300713451</update>
    </spot>
    <spot id="3">
      <name>Stadium</name>
      <user>Super User</user>
      <latitude>49.1021255103074</latitude>
      <longitude>6.21948435220338</longitude>
      <radius>150</radius>

</root>
}}}
